```sh       #!/bin/bash

      set -o verbose
      # Echoes all commands before executing.

```

```sh       #!/bin/bash

      set -v
      # Exact same effect as above.

```

```sh       #!/bin/bash

      set -o verbose
      # Command echoing on.
      command
      ...
      command

      set +o verbose
      # Command echoing off.
      command
      # Not echoed.

      set -v
      # Command echoing on.
      command
      ...
      command

      set +v
      # Command echoing off.
      command

      exit 0

```
